about_the_game:
"Post Soviet Strike: Chernobyl Legacy" thrusts you into a genetic wasteland RPG set amidst the haunting remnants of a nuclear era, where the echoes of war and the specter of Soviet influence loom large. Survive in the heart of this desolate landscape, where mutated creatures and rival factions vie for control over the shadowy ruins of civilization.

As a survivor in this post-apocalyptic landscape, you must navigate the treacherous terrain of abandoned cities, towns, and villages, each scarred by radiation and overrun by mutant horrors. Armed with a diverse arsenal of guns and weapons, from rusty pistols to modified AK rifles, you'll face off against hordes of zombies, mutants, and other sinister entities born from the radioactive fallout.

But survival demands more than brute force—it requires cunning and adaptability. Utilize stealth to outmaneuver your enemies and explore hidden anomalies lurking in the shadows. Upgrade your gear and level up your skills as you scavenge for resources amidst the ruins, trading relics of the past for a chance at a brighter future. Explore the desolate landscape of Pripyat and Chornobyl, haunted by the memories of the Liquidators who once fought to contain the radioactive fallout. Traverse eerie forests, abandoned villages, and radioactive lakes as you uncover secrets and unravel the mysteries of this post-Soviet wasteland.

Engage in heart-pounding firefights and epic boss battles as you journey through a vast open world filled with danger and adventure. Ride motorcycles, drive tanks, and commandeer buses as you traverse the radioactive wasteland in search of answers and a way to escape the horrors that lurk around every corner.

But beware, for you are not alone in this desolate world. Rival factions, demonic creatures, and mysterious anomalies threaten your survival at every turn. Will you rise to become the ultimate mutant hunter, or will you succumb to the horrors of the Red Horizon?

Roam the desolate streets of Pripyat and Chornobyl, where abandoned buildings and crumbling infrastructure serve as eerie reminders of a bygone era. Explore hidden dungeons and caves, where secrets and dangers lurk in equal measure. Descend into the depths of abandoned bunkers and factories, where the echoes of the past mingle with the whispers of the present. But amidst the chaos and destruction, a glimmer of hope remains. Uncover hidden quests and side missions scattered throughout the wasteland, each offering unique challenges and rewards. Embark on a journey of self-discovery as you confront your fears and confront the demons of your past.

As you level up and upgrade your gear, unlock new abilities and powers to aid you in your quest for survival. Master the art of parkour to traverse the urban landscape with ease, or hone your stealth skills to evade detection by enemies and predators alike.

Engage in epic boss battles against towering mutants and demonic monstrosities, each more terrifying than the last. Utilize a variety of tactics and strategies to outmaneuver your foes and emerge victorious in the face of overwhelming odds.

"Post Soviet Strike: Chernobyl Legacy" is not just a game—it's a journey into the heart of darkness, where every decision you make will shape the fate of the wasteland and its inhabitants. Will you be a beacon of hope in this dark world, or will you succumb to the horrors that lurk within? The choice is yours to make in this epic tale of survival and redemption.

name: Post Soviet Strike: Chernobyl Legacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Survive the post-Soviet wasteland of Chernobyl. Hunt mutants, scavenge for resources, and battle rival factions in this next-gen RPG shooter. Unravel secrets, upgrade weapons, and face the horrors of the Red Horizon. Will you conquer the shadows or succumb to the radioactive nightmare?
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Ukrainian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Azerbaijani, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Afrikaans, Basque, Belarusian, Bangla, Bosnian, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Dari, Zulu, Hebrew, Igbo, Irish, Icelandic, Yoruba, Kazakh, Kannada, Catalan, Quechua, Kinyarwanda, K'iche', Konkani, Xhosa, Khmer, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Serbian, Sotho, Sinhala, Sindhi, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Uzbek, Uyghur, Urdu, Filipino, Hausa, Hindi, Croatian, Cherokee, Scots, Estonian
*languages with full audio support
